title: Old retri

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may revive a dead Town member at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only revive one person.
- You cannot choose a target if their role wasn't revealed on death, or if they weren't dead when the current night started.

desc:
Post 301
*FINALLY! AFTER MONTHS OF BEING DELETED FROM TOWN OF SALEM! ITS MY TIME TO SHINE!*
